resources.string: If toggled on, courses without a Final Grade specified will be included in your CGPA calculations on the CGPA Calculator page.
Open the exported attachment on your device to launch the Science Student Success Center app and restore your data.

This app was developed for the Carleton University Science Student Success Center by Avery Vine, Special thanks to Kshamina Ghelani, Selasi Kudolo, Gina Bak, Anisha Ghelani, Lily Visanuvimol, Divin Kang, and everyone else at the SSSC whoe helped out along the way.
